items.title: Around 40 dead in Swiss ski resort bar fire, police say
items.title_zh: 警方说,瑞士滑雪胜地约有40人死亡
items.summary: Around 40 people have died after a fire ripped through a bar in a ski resort in southern Switzerland, police have said. A further 115 people are injured, many of them "severely".
items.summary_zh: 警方说,在瑞士南部滑雪胜地的一家酒吧被大火打穿后,约40人死亡。 另有115人受伤,其中许多人"严重".

items.title: What we know about the Switzerland ski resort fire
items.title_zh: 关于瑞士滑雪胜地的火灾我们所知
items.summary: Around 40 people have died and 115 people are injured following a fire in a ski resort in south-west Switzerland, police say.
items.summary_zh: 警方称,瑞士西南部的滑雪胜地发生火灾,造成约40人死亡,115人受伤.

items.title: スイス 飲食店の火災で死者約40人けが人100人以上 地元警察
items.title_zh: 一百多人死于餐厅的火灾
items.summary: スイス リゾート地の飲食店で爆発 「数十人死亡か」 地元警察
items.summary_zh: 在瑞士度假区的一家餐馆里说 "你死了几十个吗?" 当地警察

items.title: 箱根駅伝 往路【速報予定】青山学院大 駒沢大を軸に優勝争いか
items.title_zh: Hakone Ekiden 出局 快速报告表 让我们赢得青山冈津 O Komazawa O的轴心
items.summary: 「箱根駅伝」 4年に1回の記念大会は全国の大学が出場可能に
items.summary_zh: "哈克内·伊克登" 锦标赛四周年纪念日有资格进入日本大学

items.title: 柏崎刈羽原発6号機 20日に再稼働 原発再稼働に向けた動き注目
items.title_zh: 第6号 川崎川原 20日复通运营. 初级操作的改变
items.summary: 原子力規制庁 審査支援AIの開発調査費 来年度予算案に盛り込む
items.summary_zh: 大赦国际向核管制机构提供检查支助的调查费

items.title: 日本海側で雪強まる 太平洋側の平地などでも積雪おそれ 警戒を
items.title_zh: 日本海上下雪
items.summary: 大雪「外出する前」車内の備蓄と情報確認の方法は
items.summary_zh: 大雪"出门前" 如何检查车上的储存和信息

items.title: 今井達也 アストロズと契約合意 “3年99億円” 米複数メディア
items.title_zh: “990亿日元3年”
items.summary: WBC 日本代表に大谷翔平ら 8人を選出【一覧とコメント】
items.summary_zh: 选取了8名奥塔尼·肖平到WBC日本代表[列表和评论].

items.title: 立民 安保関連法に対する党の考え方 見直し含め議論へ
items.title_zh: 修订并讨论了《担保法》当事人的政策
items.summary: 尖閣諸島周辺「接続水域」 中国当局の船の航行日数 過去最多に
items.summary_zh: 中国当局出海航行天数.

items.title: Social media fuelled Mamdani's rise. Can he keep the momentum as New York mayor?
items.title_zh: 社会媒体推动了马姆达尼的崛起. 他能保持纽约市长的势头吗?
items.summary: Jumping into the frigid waters of Coney Island in January for a pun on "I'm freezing... your rent". Visiting food trucks to discuss how city permitting processes have led to "Halalflation". Walking the length of Manhattan to show New Yorkers they "deserve a mayor that they can see, they can hear, they can even yell at".
items.summary_zh: 一月份跳入科尼岛的冰冷水域 跳出"我快冻死了... 你的房租" 访问食品卡车,讨论城市许可过程如何导致"Halalflation". 走在曼哈顿的长度向纽约人展示他们"让一个他们可以看到,他们可以听到,甚至可以吼叫的市长".

items.title: Two killed in clashes between protesters and security forces in Iran
items.title_zh: 在伊朗抗议者与安全部队的冲突中有两人被炸死
items.summary: Two people are reported to have been killed during growing unrest in Iran on the fifth day of protests over the soaring cost of living.
items.summary_zh: 据报道,在伊朗抗议生活费用高涨的第五天,两人在日益严重的动乱中被害.

items.title: New discovery may challenge theory Vikings built first Irish towns - researcher
items.title_zh: 新发现可能挑战维京人建立的第一个爱尔兰城镇——研究员
items.summary: A recently discovered large hilltop settlement could challenge the theory that the Vikings built the first towns in Ireland, a researcher has said.
items.summary_zh: 最近发现的一座大型山顶定居点可能会质疑维京人建造爱尔兰第一批城镇的理论,一位研究者说.

items.title: Netherlands police face 'unprecedented' New Year's violence
items.title_zh: 荷兰警方面临"前所未有的"新年暴力
items.summary: Police in the Netherlands were pelted with fireworks and faced an "unprecedented amount of violence" on New Year's Eve, officers have said.
items.summary_zh: 荷兰警方被放出烟花并面临"前所未有的暴力",官员表示.

items.title: Watch: Historic Amsterdam church engulfed by fire on New Year's Eve
items.title_zh: 守望:历史阿姆斯特丹教堂被元宵夜大火吞没
items.summary: Residents in Amsterdam were evacuated from their homes after a huge fire ripped through the historic Vondelkerk church in the city on Thursday morning.
items.summary_zh: 阿姆斯特丹的居民在周四早上在城市历史悠久的冯德尔克克教堂被大火所刮倒后被从家中疏散出.

items.title: US military says five killed in latest strike on alleged drug boats
items.title_zh: 美军说有5人死于最近对毒品船的袭击
items.summary: The US military says it struck two boats it alleges were carrying drugs on Wednesday, killing five people on board.
items.summary_zh: 美国军方说,它击中了两艘据称星期三携带毒品的船只,造成船上5人死亡.

items.title: Stranger Things draws to an epic and emotional close
items.title_zh: 陌生人 事物吸引了史诗和情感的接近
items.summary: Stranger Things has drawn to an epic and emotional close, with a dramatic two-hour finale that briefly jammed Netflix's servers.
items.summary_zh: 陌生人 一场戏剧性的两小时决赛 短暂地卡住了Netflix的服务器

items.title: Brazil legend Roberto Carlos recovering in hospital
items.title_zh: 巴西传奇 Roberto Carlos在医院康复
items.summary: Brazil and Real Madrid legend Roberto Carlos is "recovering well" after undergoing what he described as "a preventative medical procedure".
items.summary_zh: 巴西和"真实的马德里"传奇罗伯托·卡洛斯(Roberto Carlos)在经历了他所描述的"预防性医疗程序"后"恢复得很好".

items.title: 「お父さんは頑張って生きているよ」遺族のいま【動画】
items.title_zh: "爸爸还活着" 现在的家 [视频]
items.summary: 【能登半島地震】発生から2年 被災地はいま
items.summary_zh: [诺托半岛地震]发生后2年

items.title: Zohran Mamdani sworn in as first Muslim New York City Mayor
items.title_zh: Zohran Mamdani宣誓就任首任穆斯林纽约市市长
items.summary: Democratic politician Zohran Mamdani has been sworn in as the first Muslim Mayor of New York City.
items.summary_zh: 民主政治家佐赫兰·马姆达尼宣誓就任纽约市首位穆斯林市长.

items.title: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world
items.title_zh: 图片:世界各地新年欢迎
items.summary: Countries around the world have welcomed in the New Year.
items.summary_zh: 世界各国在新年都欢迎.

items.title: Zelensky says peace deal is 90% ready in New Year address
items.title_zh: Zelensky说和约90%准备在新年演讲
items.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has said a peace agreement to end the war with Russia is "90% ready", in a New Year address that largely focused on resistance to Moscow's full-scale invasion.
items.summary_zh: 乌克兰总统沃洛德米尔·泽连斯基表示结束与俄罗斯战争的和平协议"九成准备就绪",在新年演讲中主要以抵抗莫斯科全面入侵为主.

items.title: Disney worker hurt stopping 180-kg fake boulder from hitting audience
items.title_zh: 迪士尼的工人伤害了180公斤的假巨石 阻止他们袭击观众
items.summary: A worker at Walt Disney World is "recovering" after being injured by a 400-lb (180kg) runaway fake boulder prop in an incident that was caught on video, the Florida theme park confirmed.
items.summary_zh: 华特迪士尼世界的一名工人被400磅(180kg)跑去的假石道具所伤后"正在恢复",这起事件被视频所捕获,佛罗里达主题公园确认.

items.title: Teen who died after falling 150 metres from California's Mt Baldy identified
items.title_zh: 在距加利福尼亚州巴尔迪山150米处摔倒后死去的少年
items.summary: Three hikers, including a 19-year-old who fell approximately 500 feet (150m), have been found dead on Mt Baldy, a looming snow-capped mountain known to be one of the most dangerous to climb in Southern California.
items.summary_zh: 有三名徒步者,包括一名19岁摔倒了约500英尺(150米)高地上被发现已死亡的巴尔迪山(Mt Baldy)是一座被指为南加州最危险攀登的雪盖山.

items.title: Anthony Joshua discharged from hospital after Nigeria car crash
items.title_zh: 尼日利亚车祸后,安东尼·约书亚出院
items.summary: British heavyweight boxer Anthony Joshua has been discharged from hospital in Nigeria days after a fatal car accident that killed two of his close friends.
items.summary_zh: 英国重量级拳击手安东尼·约书亚(Anthony Joshua)在尼日利亚因一起致命的车祸身亡数天后出院.

items.title: What are Russians hoping for in 2026, asks Steve Rosenberg
items.title_zh: 2026年俄国人希望什么,问史蒂夫·罗森伯格
items.summary: As the New Year holiday gets underway, the BBC's Russia editor Steve Rosenberg asks people on the streets of Moscow about their hopes for 2026 and how they see their future.
items.summary_zh: 随着新年假期的到来,BBC的俄罗斯编辑史蒂夫·罗森伯格(Steve Rosenberg)询问莫斯科街头的人们对2026年的希望,以及他们如何看待自己的未来.

items.title: Condom tax and cheaper childcare: China's plan to boost birth rates
items.title_zh: 避孕套税与更便宜的育儿:中国提高出生率计划.
items.summary: People in China will pay a 13% sales tax on contraceptives from 1 January, while childcare services will be exempt, as the world's second-largest economy tries to boost birth rates.
items.summary_zh: 中国人民将从1月1日起缴纳13%的避孕药具销售税,而儿童保育服务则免征,因为世界第二大经济体试图提高出生率。

items.title: Bulgaria joins the euro after rocky path to new currency
items.title_zh: 保加利亚在进入新货币后加入欧元
items.summary: Bulgaria - the poorest country in the European Union - has become the 21st member of the eurozone - leapfrogging more obvious and prosperous candidates like Poland, the Czech Republic and Hungary.
items.summary_zh: 保加利亚是欧洲联盟中最贫穷的国家,已成为欧元区第21个成员国,它跃升了波兰、捷克共和国和匈牙利等更为明显和繁荣的候选国。

items.title: Fireworks, drums and light shows: How the world is welcoming 2026
items.title_zh: 烟花,鼓和光线显示: 世界是怎样欢迎2026
items.summary: Crowds around the world have gathered to welcome the new year.
items.summary_zh: 世界各地群众聚集一堂来迎接新年.

items.title: Passenger describes 'chaos' after head-on Machu Picchu train collision
items.title_zh: 乘客描述在马丘比丘火车相撞之后的"Chaos"
items.summary: A passenger has described "chaos" after two trains collided head-on near Peru's most popular tourist attraction, Machu Picchu.
items.summary_zh: 一名乘客描述了在秘鲁最受欢迎的旅游景点马楚比丘附近两列列火车相撞后相撞后"chaos".

items.title: Watch: Stunning celestial events that lit up the skies in 2025
items.title_zh: 观察:2025年天空被照亮的 惊天动地事件
items.summary: From meteor showers to supermoons, many stunning celestial events have been captured on camera over the past year.
items.summary_zh: 从流星雨到超级月亮,过去一年中许多令人惊叹的天体事件被摄像头所捕获.

items.title: Sydney sends message of peace for New Year's after Bondi attack
items.title_zh: 悉尼在邦迪被袭击后 发来和平信息
items.summary: Sydney has welcomed the New Year with a message of peace following the Bondi Beach mass shooting, as huge crowds gathered to watch the city's annual fireworks display.
items.summary_zh: 悉尼以邦迪海滩大规模枪击后的和平信息欢迎了新年,因为大批人群聚集在一起观看了该市的年度烟花展.

items.title: Diane Keaton, Pope Francis and Ozzy Osbourne... famous faces who left us in 2025
items.title_zh: Diane Keaton 教宗方济各和Ozzy Osbourne... 2025年离开我们的著名面孔
items.summary: The first non-European Pope in more than 1,000 years, the Oscar-winning star of Annie Hall and The Godfather, a soul legend and one of the world's most famous designers - here are some of the well-known faces no longer with us.
items.summary_zh: 1000多年以来第一位非欧洲教宗,安妮·霍尔和"教父"的奥斯卡得奖之星,灵魂传说和世界上最出名的设计师之一-这里已经有一些出名的面孔不再和我们在一起了.

items.title: Saving South Africa's threatened albatross from lethal fishing lines
items.title_zh: 从致命的钓鱼线上拯救南非受到威胁的信天翁
items.summary: On a small boat in the Atlantic, about 27 nautical miles (50km) away from South Africa's Cape Point, a group of bird watchers are calling out seabird names: "Atlantic yellow-nosed! Black-browed albatross!"
items.summary_zh: 在大西洋的一艘小船上,距离南非"角点"约27海里(50公里)外,一群鸟类观察者呼唤出海鸟的名字:"大西洋黄鼻! 黑发信天翁!"

items.title: The 'thorny' issues that threaten to derail a Russia-Ukraine peace deal
items.title_zh: 可能破坏俄乌克兰和约的"大问题"
items.summary: Russia, the US and Ukraine agree that a deal on ending almost four years of full-scale war is edging closer but, in the words of President Donald Trump, "one or two very thorny, very tough issues" remain.
items.summary_zh: 俄国、美国和乌克兰都同意, 结束近四年全面战争的协议正在逐渐逼近,
